channel.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
channel.description:
[center][u][b]The Team[/b][/u]:
Server Developers - Me, Mr Extremez on Mopar & I'm A Boss on R-S.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6ofJ1.png[/img]
[u][b]Progress[/b][/u]:
The red color means the feature has not yet been started. The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction. The green color means the feature has been finished.
[u][b]Client Features[/b][/u]:
- Fast client - Autocache downloader - 377 Maps - 377 Items - 377 Anims/Gfx - 377 Gameframe - 377 Mpcs - No customs
[u][b]Server Features[/b][/u]:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [u][b]Prayer[/b][/u]:
- All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate [img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [u][b]Agility[/b][/u]:
- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness courses usable - Force movement mask - Correct animations used - Run energy affected by weight and level - Pyramid Course
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [u][b]Firemaking[/b][/u]:
- Correct anims - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - Clipped
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [u][b]Woodcutting[/b][/u]:
- Stumps and regrowing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fell chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe random event - Canoes
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b][u]Mining[/u][/b]:
- Emptying and refilling rocks - All ores can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animations - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gems - Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms - Mining gems at shilo village - Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] [b][u]Fletching[/u][/b]:
- All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b][u]Crafting[/u][/b]:
- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b][u]Thieving[/u][/b]:
- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [u][b]Fishing[/b][/u]:
- All fishing spots - All fishes fishable - Correct equipment - Correct animations - Moving locations
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [u][b]Cooking[/b][/u]:
- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food - Wine
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [u][b]Runecrafting[/b][/u]: - Altar Enterting - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [u][b]Herblore[/b][/u]:
- All potions makeable - Itentifying herbs - Weapon poisioning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OomYz.gif[/img] [b][u]Slayer[/u][/b]:
- All slayer masters - All slayer tasks - All equipments - Slayer gem - Correct task requirements - Slayer shops
[u][b]To do[/b][/u]:
-Farming -Smithing
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] [u][b]Combat[/b][/u]:
-Project Insanity Combat with many fixes and Add-Ons. -Perfect Range Formula
[u][b]Bosses[/b][/u]:
-Agrith Na-Na -Agrith Naar -Big Wolf -Bouncer -Chaos Elemental -Chronozon -Count Draynor -Culinaromancer -Dagganoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagganoth Prime -Damis -Delrith -Dessous -Dessourt -Elvarg -Fareed -Flambeed -General Khazard -Giant Mole -Gunthor the Brave -Kalphite Queen -Kamil -King Black Dragon -Koschei The Deathless -Nezikchened -Salarin the Twisted -Sea Troll Queen -Slash Bash -Shaikahan -Tanglefoot -Tolna -Treus Dayth -TzTok-Jad
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [u][b]Minigames[/b][/u]:
-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Fight Caves -Barrows -Fight Pits -Pest Control -Fishing Trawler -Gnome Ball -Bar crawl -Blast Furnace -Champion's Challenge -Chompy hunting -Games room -Jungle Clean Up -Pet Care (You get a pet, feed it, take care of it until it grows, and sell it for rewards at ardougne) -Rogue Trader -Rogue's Den -Splitbark Armour -Temple Trekking -Magic Training Arena
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] [u][b]Random Events[/b][/u]:
-Broken axe random -Bird Nests -Lots more to be done
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [u][b]Quests[/b][/u]: -Clean Quest Tab -Planning to add atleast 15 -Tutorial Island
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [u][b]Miscellaneous[/b][/u]: -97 % of runescape spawns includes (fish spots, all shops, all main cities, and more) -100 % of runescape shops (103 shops loaded) -99.9 % of dupes fixed (If there are any left they will be fixed asap) -90 % + all skills to be done -99 % of runescape foods added -97 % of all doors around the world (Will be adding the rest when found) -99 % potions (All should be added may be missing one or two) -99 % runescape drops (Basic drop system atm) -All guilds openable with requirements -Wilderness warning sign -Normal and Ancient Magics (No lunars because it wasn't in 2006) -Exact Runescape Teleports (Gives exp, requires runes, requires levels, misc teleport, requires member for ancients and some moderns, and more...) -Old Runescape Starter -Runescape price rip -Adding Quests Exactly like Runescape -Report Abuse -Runescape like Sailing with all locations -Full Gnome Glider Transportation -Bank Pins -Christmas Crackers -Fully Functional Teletabs -Full Pickables (Cabbage, Flax, Wheat, Onions, Potato, Etc...) -Full Weapon Poisioning -Many, May, Bugs fixed -Add or Drop Item Function (If you don't have enough room it goes on the ground) -Chat Filtering System -Fully Functional 99 % Skill Guides -Hostname Blacklist Implemented -Al Kharid Gates and Shantay Pass -Running with Energy (Will have weight soon) -Runescape Combat Exp Rates -Magic Carpet -Ladder System -Rings that will be ingame (Dueling, Wealth, Life, Recoil) -Amulets that will be ingame (Glory, Games Necklace, Ghostspeak Amulet) -100 % clue scroll rewards (Need Drops) -Hide Tanning -Canoes -Music Player -Teletabs -Looping animations added (Don't stop half way through) -Random Events -Crystal Chest -Flax Stringing -Aubury -Clipped Npcs (Walking, Following) (Attacking) -Clipped Following -Full emptying system (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc) - Water Filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc) - Perfect Magic Enchanting added
[u][b]Changelog[/b][/u]:
[code] -Enabled Client to work with server -Changed named of everything -Added cycle events -Added exact runescape teleports class -Added smithing x1, x5, x10 -Redid Prayer -Redid Runecrafting -Redid Woodcutting -Added Report Abuse -Added exact runescape spawns -Added exact runescape shops -Ripped runescape prices -Added Report Abuse -Added old runescape starter -Added Gnome gliders -Added bank pins -Added Sailing -Added wilderness warning sign -Added Exact runescape Teleports Class -Redid commands class -Added Mining Base -Fixed bugs for mining base -Potion Emptying added -Christmas Crackers -Added Teletabs -Sleds Added -All Bank cases Added -Destroy Item Interface Added -Cow Milking Added -Added Flax -Added Cabbage -Added Grain -Added Onions -Npc Distance Fix -Full Weapon Poisioning Added -Trade Glitch Fixed -Fixed Diagonal Attack Glitch -Fixed X Log -Open Bank anywhere Fixed -Dupe Fixed -Cooking base Added -Fixed 2 eclipse errors and 10 warnings -Magic Spell Animations Fixed -Cleared Quest Tab -Add or Drop Item Method added -A couple spawns fixed -20 + Bugs Fixed -Thieving Added -Fixed 30 more eclipse warnings -Ancient Teleporting Class Added -Fixed action processing -Added 10 different death messages -Chat filtering added -Added Tutorial Island Interface -Fixed 2 Eclipse Errors -Fixed 5 Eclipse Warnings -Added Perfect Dharoks Formula -Added Skill Guides -Fixed Skull Guide Bugs -Fixed object clicking glitch -Added Firemaking base -Fixed more eclipse warnings -Fixed saving for ancient and magic altars -Fixed Duel arena Glitch -No Clip Glitched Fixed -Hostname blacklisting added and fully working -Fixed all teleport names -Fixed Ape Toll Teleport -Added More Spawns -Removed Spawns that weren't in 2006 -Working on adding all single and double doors -Removed the rest of the spawns that weren't in 2006 -Added more spawns -All runescape foods added -Added easy to use doors system -Adding almost all doors around the world -Added some things for tutorial island -Added Al Kharid Gates (Costs 5 Coins) -Added Shantay Pass Gate -Fixed All Pickables -Added Flax Picking Class -Update Command Fixed -Added more basic things to tutorial island (Starter, if you haven't completed it you spawn there, if you die there you spawn there, progress bar, some spawns, and more) -Fixed More Bugs -Fixed Add or Drop Item Glitch -Added Shantay Pass Shop -Added running with engergy -Added saving for run energy -Added Sleds -Ladder System Added -Added Ring of Dueling/With Charges -Added Amulet of Glory/With Charges -Added Recharging for Glory -Fixed Amulet of Glory -Added Games Necklace -Added Gnome Course -Added Brimhaven Course -Added Wilderness Course -Fixed Npc Clicking -Fixed 3 more dupes -Added ring of recoil -Fixed exp rates -Added ring of wealth -Added Runes class -Made ancients and normal teleporting class more efficent -Added better ladders system -Fixed ladder glitches -Perfect Range formula added -Clean potion Messages added -100 % potions added -Hide tanning added -Fixed duel dupe -Fixed alchemy dupe -Fixed another duel dupe -Fixed another duel dupe -Added magic carpet -Added more dialogue methods -Arrow dupe fixed -100 % clue scroll rewards added -Rewrote ancients, moderns, and magic class -Fixed magic with staffs -Redid emotes added emotes class -Fixed all known duel arena glitches -Added fully working castle wars -Vial Filling Added -Crystal Chest Added -Fixed add item method -Cleaned up some code -Capitalizing Fixed -Fixed a magic switching bug -Fixed a combat level bug -Birds nests added -Added working kebabs -Fixed eclipse shit -Removed ladder handler there was way to many bugs with it (Will add a new one) -Dark Wizards Added -Water fillables added (Buckets, Vials, Bowls) -Added music tab -All guilds doors added with requirements -Quest points added -Looping animations added -Perfect woodcutting added -Basic canoes added -Broken axe random added -Fixed some packets(Including christmas cracker packet) -Added Mining -Fixed Mining animations -Explosive rocks added -More bugs fixed -Added rest of shop spawns -All of runescape shops added -Flax stringing added -Fixed all Shop Bugs 103 shops loaded and fully working -Fixed more bugs! -Crafting added -Thieving added -Fletching added -Aubury Added -Fixed more bugs -Fixed tons of more small bugs (Al kharid gate bugs, shantay pass, spawns, shops etc..) -Ladder system added -Monkey archers are now aggressive -Fixed more bugs -Fixed monkey archers hits -Added monkey guards -Fixed stairs at ape atoll -Added aubury -Fixed portal at rune essence -Made monkey guards aggressive -Fixed ape atoll ladders -Fixed more bugs -Fixed all mining bugs -Fixed fletching bugs -Fight caves added -Fixed multi sign interface -Fixed more client warnings -Fishing added -Cooking added -More bugs fixed -More bosses added -Clipped following added -Clipped firemaking added -Clipped npcs added -Banker Dialogues added -Fixed tons of more bugs -Real Skill Guides added -Added 377 attack/death emotes for npcs -Fixed more bugs -Added Runecrafting -Firemaking updated -Added Herblore Skill -Fixed a ton of bugs -Added slayer -Fixed tons of more shit -Full emptying system added (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc) -All filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc) -Full pickables added -Fixed lots of more bugs -Added more npc drops -Added all foods and rewrote class -Fixed barrows, tzhaar cave, and barb dung map walls. -Added barrows -Added fight pits -Added pest control -Added perfect magic enchanting -Fixed all the rest of firemaking bugs -Decided on exp rate, 1x skilling, 2x combat -Added correct run energy -Cooking skill updated [/code]
[u][b]Positions Open[/b][/u]:
-Web Developer: 0/1 -Server Developers: 1/3
[b]Apply here[/b]: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,549829.0.html

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:2, topic:447514”]First post! (I hope xD)

Looks good man! Keep up the work! If you need anyone to bug test or anything like that just shoot me PM I’m always on and always down to help![/quote]Okay thanks i’ll make sure to message you if I do. But I’m planning on having a pre alpha, alpha, and beta. To test for bugs before the server comes out.

Update:

  • More bosses added.
  • Clipped following and npcs added.
  • Herblore skill added.
  • Fixed a ton of more bugs.
  • Slayer added.

Update 2:

-Added all Fillables
-Added Emptying for all items that can be emptied
-Full pickables added
-Fixed lots of more bugs
-Added more npc drops
-Added all foods and rewrote class

Update3:

-Added fight pits
-Added pest control
-Added barrows

Update4:

-Fixed all the rest of firemaking bugs
-Decided on exp rate, 1x skilling, 2x combat

Update5:

-Cooking fixed up

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

First post! (I hope xD)

Looks good man! Keep up the work! If you need anyone to bug test or anything like that just shoot me PM I’m always on and always down to help!

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[center]The Team:

Server Developers - Me, Mr Extremez on Mopar & I’m A Boss on R-S.

6ofJ1.png751×104

Progress:

The red color means the feature has not yet been started.
The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction.
The green color means the feature has been finished.

Client Features:

  • Fast client
  • Autocache downloader
  • 377 Maps
  • 377 Items
  • 377 Anims/Gfx
  • 377 Gameframe
  • 377 Mpcs
  • No customs

Server Features:

Prayer:

  • All bones bury-able

  • Every prayer working properly

  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
    Agility:

  • Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness courses usable

  • Force movement mask

  • Correct animations used

  • Run energy affected by weight and level

  • Pyramid Course

Firemaking:

  • Correct anims
  • Ashes
  • All logs lightable
  • Colored fires
  • Clipped

Woodcutting:

  • Stumps and regrowing trees
  • Correct hatchet finding
  • Correct hatchet animations
  • All trees cut-able
  • Correct fell chance algorithms
  • Birds nest falling out
  • Broken axe random event
  • Canoes

Mining:

  • Emptying and refilling rocks
  • All ores can be mined
  • Correct pickaxe finding and animations
  • Prospecting
  • Random chance of obtaining gems
  • Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
  • Mining gems at shilo village
  • Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)

Fletching:

  • All logs can be fletched
  • Correct interfaces
  • Fletch 5, 10, x, all

Crafting:

  • Gem cutting
  • Tanning
  • Spinning & Picking flax
  • Pottery

Thieving:

  • Stall Thieving
  • NPC Thieving
  • Correct anims & gfx

Fishing:

  • All fishing spots
  • All fishes fishable
  • Correct equipment
  • Correct animations
  • Moving locations

Cooking:

  • All fishes cookable
  • All meat cookable
  • Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews.
  • Cooking gauntlets
  • Correct anims & delays
  • Working interface with multiple amount options
  • Lumbridge cooking range bonus
  • Eating food
  • Wine

Runecrafting:

  • Altar Enterting
  • Tiaras
  • All Altars
  • Abyss

Herblore:

  • All potions makeable
  • Itentifying herbs
  • Weapon poisioning

Slayer:

  • All slayer masters
  • All slayer tasks
  • All equipments
  • Slayer gem
  • Correct task requirements
  • Slayer shops

To do:

-Farming
-Smithing

Combat:

-Project Insanity Combat with many fixes and Add-Ons.
-Perfect Range Formula

Bosses:

-Agrith Na-Na
-Agrith Naar
-Big Wolf
-Bouncer
-Chaos Elemental
-Chronozon
-Count Draynor
-Culinaromancer
-Dagganoth Supreme
-Dagganoth Rex
-Dagganoth Prime
-Damis
-Delrith
-Dessous
-Dessourt

-Fareed
-Flambeed
-General Khazard
-Giant Mole
-Gunthor the Brave
-Kalphite Queen
-Kamil
-King Black Dragon
-Koschei The Deathless
-Nezikchened
-Salarin the Twisted
-Sea Troll Queen
-Slash Bash
-Shaikahan
-Tanglefoot
-Tolna
-Treus Dayth
-TzTok-Jad

Minigames:

-Duel Arena
-Castle Wars
-Fight Caves
-Barrows

-Pest Control
-Fishing Trawler
-Gnome Ball
-Bar crawl
-Blast Furnace

-Games room
-Jungle Clean Up
-Pet Care (You get a pet, feed it, take care of it until it grows, and sell it for rewards at ardougne)
-Rogue Trader
-Rogue’s Den
-Splitbark Armour
-Temple Trekking
-Magic Training Arena

Random Events:

-Broken axe random
-Bird Nests
-Lots more to be done

Quests:
-Clean Quest Tab
-Planning to add atleast 15
-Tutorial Island

Miscellaneous:
-97 % of runescape spawns includes (fish spots, all shops, all main cities, and more)
-100 % of runescape shops (103 shops loaded)
-99.9 % of dupes fixed (If there are any left they will be fixed asap)
-90 % + all skills to be done
-99 % of runescape foods added
-97 % of all doors around the world (Will be adding the rest when found)
-99 % potions (All should be added may be missing one or two)
-99 % runescape drops (Basic drop system atm)
-All guilds openable with requirements
-Wilderness warning sign
-Normal and Ancient Magics (No lunars because it wasn’t in 2006)
-Exact Runescape Teleports (Gives exp, requires runes, requires levels, misc teleport, requires member for ancients and some moderns, and more…)
-Old Runescape Starter
-Runescape price rip
-Adding Quests Exactly like Runescape
-Report Abuse
-Runescape like Sailing with all locations
-Full Gnome Glider Transportation
-Bank Pins
-Christmas Crackers
-Fully Functional Teletabs
-Full Pickables (Cabbage, Flax, Wheat, Onions, Potato, Etc…)
-Full Weapon Poisioning
-Many, May, Bugs fixed
-Add or Drop Item Function (If you don’t have enough room it goes on the ground)
-Chat Filtering System
-Fully Functional 99 % Skill Guides
-Hostname Blacklist Implemented
-Al Kharid Gates and Shantay Pass
-Running with Energy (Will have weight soon)
-Runescape Combat Exp Rates
-Magic Carpet
-Ladder System
-Rings that will be ingame (Dueling, Wealth, Life, Recoil)
-Amulets that will be ingame (Glory, Games Necklace, Ghostspeak Amulet)
-100 % clue scroll rewards (Need Drops)
-Hide Tanning
-Canoes
-Music Player
-Teletabs
-Looping animations added (Don’t stop half way through)
-Random Events
-Crystal Chest
-Flax Stringing
-Aubury
-Clipped Npcs (Walking, Following) (Attacking)
-Clipped Following
-Full emptying system (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc)

  • Water Filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc)
  • Perfect Magic Enchanting added
